Faults.message:
We're sorry about the power cut in the area. The power cutis affecting some properties in the area shown on the map, but not all. This iswhy you may notice some of your neighbours have power, but you dont. Itsnormal to see 1 in 3 homes affected. Were working with our engineers to fixthe problem as quickly as possible, and well keep you updated here on PowerTrack.

It's busier than usual just now, but we'll be sending our engineers to the area as soon as possible. When they're on their way, we'll let you know what time they'll be arriving. At this stage, we're aiming to have your power back on by13:00 19/07/2025.

The cause of this power cut is a fault on our underground network. This is the most common type of fault we see, and our teams are very experienced in dealing with these issues. In most cases, our engineers are able to get your power back on by simply replacing a fuse at the local substation, however, if the fault is severe, this may take us longer to fix. If this does happen, we will let you know.

If you need more information, please send us a message on Whatsapp or call us on 105 and quote reference 'RH0184'

Faults.name: BH1 Area

Faults.message:
We're sorry about the power cut in the area. The power cutis affecting some properties in the area shown on the map, but not all. This iswhy you may notice some of your neighbours have power, but you dont. Itsnormal to see 1 in 3 homes affected. Were working with our engineers to fixthe problem as quickly as possible, and well keep you updated here on PowerTrack.

It's busier than usual just now, but we'll be sending our engineers to the area as soon as possible. When they're on their way, we'll let you know what time they'll be arriving. At this stage, we're aiming to have your power back on by13:00 19/07/2025.

We have had reports of damage to our network by a third-party which has in turn caused the power to go off in your area. We know where this damage has taken place and our teams are working hard to make the situation safe, repair the damage and get your power back on. These type of faults often require extensive work and specialist teams which is why the restoration time seems so far away. If we can restore power sooner, we promise we will do so.

If you need more information, please send us a message on Whatsapp or call us on 105 and quote reference 'RH0266'
Faults.name: SO14 Area

Faults.message:
We're sorry about the power cut in the area. The power cutis affecting 31 properties in the area shown on the map. Wereworking with our engineers to fix the problem as quickly as possible, and wellkeep you updated here on Power Track.

Engineers have arrived in the area. They are working hard to fix the problem and will get your power back on as quickly as possible. At this stage, we're aiming to have your power back on by 07:30 19/07/2025. If this changes, we'll let you know.

We have had to isolate your power due to a safety concern on our network. Where possible, we will always try to keep the power on, however, there are situations like this where we need to isolate the power to keep people safe. There is no concern for safety at your property, however, there is an isolated issue elsewhere our teams need to make safe before they can turn your power back on.

If you need more information, please send us a message on Whatsapp or call us on 105 and quote reference 'RH0282'

Faults.name: PH25 Area

Faults.message: Planned power cut: Theres a Planned Power Cut in the area today so we cancarry out essential work. Our engineers will complete this work as quickly aspossible, and well keep you updated here on Power Track.All affected customers received a letter and a text reminderabout this. If you have a power cut but didnt get a letter, please call us on105 or send us a message on Facebook or Twitter@ssencommunity)with reference '240879'.
Faults.name: PH2 Area
